plays.text: Penalty to Luc Robitaille 2 minutes for Hooking Jarome Iginla
Penalty to Craig Berube 2 minutes for High Sticking Chris Chelios
Penalty to Marc Savard 2 minutes for Holding Sean Avery
Penalty to Jiri Fischer 2 minutes for Interference Scott Nichol
Penalty to Chris Chelios 2 minutes for Crosschecking Jarome Iginla
Goal scored by Marc Savard assisted by Igor Kravchuk and Craig Conroy
Penalty to JASON BOTTERILL 2 minutes for Obstruction - Tripping Chris Chelios
Penalty to Denis Gauthier 2 minutes for Crosschecking Sean Avery
Goal scored by Jarome Iginla assisted by Marc Savard and Jamie Wright
Goal scored by Luc Robitaille assisted by Steve Duchesne
Goal scored by Igor Larionov assisted by Luc Robitaille and Fredrik Olausson
Goal scored by Marc Savard assisted by Jarome Iginla and Jamie Wright
Goal scored by Brendan Shanahan assisted by Sergei Fedorov and Kris Draper
Penalty to Igor Larionov 2 minutes for Crosschecking Jukka Hentunen
Goal scored by Marc Savard assisted by Craig Conroy and Jarome Iginla
Penalty to Jarome Iginla 2 minutes for Roughing Luc Robitaille
Penalty to Luc Robitaille 2 minutes for Slashing Roman Turek
Penalty to Brendan Shanahan 2 minutes for High Sticking Scott Nichol
